algorithms.imageProcessing

Class Features

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.imageProcessing.IntensityFeatures
      • algorithms.imageProcessing.Features

  • public class Features
extends IntensityFeatures
    NOT READY FOR USE. NOT TESTED YET. class to help extract and reuse feature descriptors.
    Author:
    nichole

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FeatureComparisonStat calculateGradientStats(GradientDescriptor descGradient1, int x1, int y1, GradientDescriptor descGradient2, int x2, int y2)
      calculate the intensity and gradient based statistics between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
      static FeatureComparisonStat calculateStats(IntensityDescriptor descIntensity1, GradientDescriptor descGradient1, int x1, int y1, IntensityDescriptor descIntensity2, GradientDescriptor descGradient2, int x2, int y2)
      calculate the intensity and gradient based statistics between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
      static FeatureComparisonStat calculateStats(IntensityDescriptor descIntensity1, GradientDescriptor descGradient1, ThetaDescriptor descTheta1, int x1, int y1, IntensityDescriptor descIntensity2, GradientDescriptor descGradient2, ThetaDescriptor descTheta2, int x2, int y2)
      calculate the intensity and gradient based statistics between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
      GradientDescriptor extractGradient(int xCenter, int yCenter, int rotation) 
      ThetaDescriptor extractTheta(int xCenter, int yCenter, int rotation)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Features

        public Features(GreyscaleImage image,
                GreyscaleImage theGradientImg,
                GreyscaleImage theThetaImg,
                int blockHalfWidths,
                boolean useNormalizedIntensities)
        Parameters:
        image -
        theGradientImg - gradient image of the image region (usually from the process of creating corners).
        theThetaImg - the gradient orientation angle image
        blockHalfWidths - the half width of a block. For example, to extract the 25 pixels centered on (xc, yc), bHalfW would be '2'
        useNormalizedIntensities - normalize the intensities extracted from image if true (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

      • Features

        public Features(Image image,
                GreyscaleImage theGradientImg,
                GreyscaleImage theThetaImg,
                int blockHalfWidths,
                boolean useNormalizedIntensities)
        Parameters:
        image -
        theGradientImg - gradient image of the image region (usually from the process of creating corners).
        theThetaImg - the gradient orientation angle image
        blockHalfWidths - the half width of a block. For example, to extract the 25 pixels centered on (xc, yc), bHalfW would be '2'
        useNormalizedIntensities - normalize the intensities extracted from image if true (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)

    • Method Detail

      • extractGradient

        public GradientDescriptor extractGradient(int xCenter,
                                          int yCenter,
                                          int rotation)
        Parameters:
        xCenter -
        yCenter -
        rotation - dominant orientation in degrees for feature at (xCenter, yCenter)
        Returns:
        descriptor holding gradient rotated. NOTE that the method may return null if ant part of the center coordinate cell was was rotated out of the frame.

      • extractTheta

        public ThetaDescriptor extractTheta(int xCenter,
                                    int yCenter,
                                    int rotation)
        extract theta orientation from the image for (xCenter, yCenter) and return it in a descriptor.
        Parameters:
        xCenter -
        yCenter -
        rotation - dominant orientation in degrees for feature at (xCenter, yCenter)
        Returns:
        descriptor for theta extracted from the image. NOTE that this method may return null if the (xCenter, yCenter) frame is rotated in part out of the frame.

      • calculateStats

        public static FeatureComparisonStat calculateStats(IntensityDescriptor descIntensity1,

                                                   int x2,
                                                   int y2)
        calculate the intensity and gradient based statistics between the two descriptors with the caveat that the 2nd descriptor is the one used to calculate the error (so make sure that pattern is consistently used by invoker).
        Parameters:
        descIntensity1 -
        descGradient1 -

        y1 -
        descIntensity2 -
        descGradient2 -
        x2 -
        y2 -
